title: FEATURE JOBS: Ovira, Krystle Knight Jewellery, Fig & Bloom, Arch Rivals Marketing + More
text:
Do you want to work for a company that is set to transform the period-care industry? Ovira are about to launch their product, a small wearable device that instantly stops period pain, and are hiring a full time Marketing Manager (MELB) to help the business grow. The ideal candidate would be involved in creating the company’s long-term strategy as well as developing and executing brand communications across multiple channels. Responsibilities include developing and executing a content marketing plan (blogging, graphic, video and social media) that is according to budget, managing ad platforms such as Facebook and Instagram, building brand awareness and staying on top of marketing and industry trends. If you have 1 year experience in marketing, are customer obsessed and deadline driven, then this job would be perfect for you! Apply today.

Want to earn some extra cash during Christmas? Then keep reading! Krystle Knight Jewellery are seeking a Dispatch Assistant (SYD) to join their team for 2-3 days per week as a Christmas casual. The successful applicant would be assisting in packing and dispatching online orders, responding to customer service enquiries via email, driving and processing showroom sales and merchandising showroom. You would need to have a current drivers licence, the ability to work under pressure in a fast paced environment and have attention to detail. Apply now for this great opportunity!

Are you a florist designer ready to take your career to the next level? Then you have come to the right place! Fig & Bloom are looking for an experienced senior florist designer to join their team as a full time Florist Manager. Fig & Bloom are a family owned business that is Australia’s fastest growing and only 5-star rated flower delivery service. They are looking for a floral designer with minimum 2 years experience, who is a team player with good communication skills and who also has an eye for colour and composition. Apply here.

Are you finishing your marketing degree and want some experience in the industry? Then Arch Rivals Marketing would love to hear from you! They are looking for a Digital Marketing & Social Media Intern (SYD) to join their team 1 day per week. You would need to be a team player that is confident, motivated and has a ‘can do’ attitude. The intern would gain skills in copywriting, content creation, marketing, PR, and communications! You would be exposed to a range of clients in industries such as beauty/fashion, retail, hospitality, travel, real estate and more. Don’t miss out on this great opportunity and apply today!

Did not find what you were looking for? Check out more opportunities below:

Havas Media are looking for a full time Senior Performance Executive (SYD) to create and implement strategies. Apply here.

House of CB are searching for a full time Retail Sales Assistant (PER) to join their close knit team. Apply today.

Equalution are hiring a full time Graphic Designer/Producer (SYD) to help create emotive and compelling content. Apply now.
